name: Eat-Dat-Burger
description: An application the allows the user to input different hamburgers they would like to try. All burgers are stored on a mySQL database. The user can save the burger they ate to their burger hall of fame, or choose to delete it right away and hopefully forget they ever ate it.
techUsed: Handlebars, CSS, mySQL, Node JS, Express

name: One Stop Code Shop - Forum
description: A site that allows users to communicate with each other through forum posts and a chat. Please use demo and demo as login info to view the site. I worked on the overall handlebars set up for each page and the routing to connect mySQL to the site.

name: GameScraper
description: This application allows a user to scrape theverge.com/games for current gaming news. The user can then save the info to a mongo database, and add notes or comments to the article. The user may also delete their notes or the saved articles.
